website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive board for more experienced users. Excellent maneuverability.
pros: Despite the low price tag, this is a well-constructed board that comes with several basic accessories, including a reliable pump and a good paddle
Suitable for a range of weights
The three fins make for easy handling
cons: Some users received boards that did not inflate evenly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry and inflate! Anyone could do it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pump up (maybe 20 mins with breaks attaching the leash, fin and putting paddle together), light enough to easily be carried, drop in the water and go! I would have never know this was inflatable if I had rented it from somewhere. Plus the pink is amazing!!!!! Look no further snag this one. Possibly my favorite thing ever purchased on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Danee McMahan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic ... So Easy to get Started!!
customer_reviews.text: Received the board and within 20 minutes we were ready to go. Excellently made, high quality and most of all my Wife is really happy with it. Our son used it and was up and standing within 5 minutes. At over 200#, there was no problem. For the price...this can‘t be beat. And, it arrived in 3 days, without prime!!! This was bizarre since we didn’t expect it till 7/11. I took note of the >90% approval and used that as a guide, which was exactly correct.
customer_reviews.author: Rellimlm

customer_reviews.title: I picked a Winner! Great Board!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this board! Easy to set up and board and gear goes right back into bag with no issues. There is hundreds of boards to choose from I spent days researching and after this was the winner and glad I did. My daughter who weighs 90lbs and 2 friends same size were all piled on board and no issues with floatation. My daughter loves it that’s what matters!!
customer_reviews.author: CfWvcoastiE

customer_reviews.title: Great board
customer_reviews.text: The board seems so much bigger than I realized it would be but it didn’t flex at all while I paddled. I didn’t inflate all of the way to the max and it was perfect. Definitely want to do what someone else suggested for flotation of the paddle (pool noodle around the metal part). No problems - loved it.
customer_reviews.author: leslie2012

customer_reviews.title: Much more then expected...
customer_reviews.text: So, this was my first paddle board.. My favorite color is pink so that one reason I bought this! I must say I did go off of reviews, when I purchase this board. I love it, loved that everything came with it that is described.. I received it at a reasonable time.. oh my dog loves it too! So weather it’s your first or last, I would recommend this awesome paddle board!!
customer_reviews.author: *Amber*

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of the summer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these paddle boards! They were easy to inflate; less than 5 minutes. I found the last 1.5 - 2 minutes required actual effort. I was impressed by the stability and the strength of the boards. My (adult) daughter and I were on the same board at one point and we weren't concerned at all. We took the boards with us on a cross-country roadtrip and had a blast on Lake Huron. I would highly recommend these boards!
customer_reviews.author: mkoenig

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Board!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent beginner board. I never even tried one before, and I am easily able to get the hang of it on this board. It glides easily and is forgiving for the most part if you over balance one side. I did end up in the drink a couple of times but that was mostly my fault lol. The pump that comes with it is great, but a workout, so if you can, get the electric. It can easily be handled with one person: set up, carry, and pack up. My kids and nephews loved it and this board was a hit at the beach. This is going to give summer that extra fun!
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: Great SUP!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been coveting a SUP for a while now, but prices have been prohibitive. Until we found this one! He's used it on a smallish lake, a creek, and Lake Michigan with great success. It rode a bit low in the water when he tried it with our two teenage sons on board but it still actually held all three of them! Easy to inflate and deflate; perfect for transporting. He's loving it and so are the kids.
customer_reviews.author: A Quiet Life

customer_reviews.title: Love my paddleboard
customer_reviews.text: Love my paddleboard! I had issues with the slide-in fin falling off and the air pump breaking, but after contacting the company, all parts have been ordered at no cost to me as well as an additional discount for my troubles. I get so many compliments on my board! Everyone loves the pink color and asks me where I got it. I always tell them Amazon and the SereneLife paddleboard
customer_reviews.author: runner girl

customer_reviews.title: I would Highly Recommend !!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this SUP after reading reviews for several inflatable paddle boards on amazon. The board takes some time and energy to pump up but the board is very stable and easy to assemble. The adjustable paddle is convenient and easy to use. The best part is the rolls up into the easy to carry backpack that it comes in and stored or taken out to any body of water/vacation destination in the trunk of your car. I have only used this SUP board a few times and have let me friend borrow it, I have no complaints at this time. IT WAS WELL WORTH THE MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: SMbeachlife

customer_reviews.title: VERY IMPRESSIVE
customer_reviews.text: I am a first time buyer with regards to a SUP board and I have to say, it is very impressive. I have been doing a lot of research for a cheap, beginner board. I was shocked to find one this cheap. For the cost of this board, it is an excellent board! I have to wait a little longer for nice weather to take it out but I did inflate it and it's amazing. The ONLY thing I would change is to add instructions for a couple of things I am unsure of. I will do more research to find my answers but overall, EXTREMELY happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mel Lou

customer_reviews.title: This board is twisted. Unusable.
customer_reviews.text: The stand up paddle board is warped. It's slightly twisted along its length. This makes it very unstable, since the board is not sitting flatly on the water. Also, the telescopic paddle can not be solidly arrested. The telescopic part keeps sliding around. Inflating and deflating is easy enough with the supplied pump and some elbow grease. On a breezy day you must wear the supplied leash because the board will get away from you faster than you can swim. It has a much higher profile than a solid board, therefore the wind drives it away quickly. What's left to say is that because of the warping, it's not usable. It's not tracking straight and it's very tippy.
customer_reviews.author: Markus K

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t pump up!
customer_reviews.text: So DISAPPOINTED! I did a lot of research and decided on this SUP. It was going to be my second inflatable SUP so I could take friends/my kids out. It was impossible to pump up. I refuse to use the manual pump - takes too long and too much work. I have two electric pumps that have pumped up Red Paddle Co. and Goplus SUPs in the past with no problems. The valve on the Serene life looked exactly the same. I tried to blow it up with both pumps and it kept leaking. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: KC Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great iSUP
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a fantastic board. It is stable and easy to maneuver. I purchased this board for my husband and I have a similar model (different color). The board is easy to inflate (under 10 minutes) and even easier to deflate (maybe 5 minutes). My husband is 5’10” and 185 pounds. The board inflated to 13 Psi is stable and rigid. He love the adjustable paddle and after five uses has never had an issue fitting everything bag in the handy carrying bag/backpack once we are done. Great boards for the perfect price point.
customer_reviews.author: Tphil

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this inflatable SUP. This is the only one I've ever used, so I don't have anything to compare it to, but I'm impressed by the rigidity considering it is inflatable. For reference I am 5'9", approx 160lbs. It can definitely be a task to inflate it, but I just consider that to be my warm up. I have noticed that I am able to deflate, wipe dry, and pack this quicker than some people can load their rigid kayaks/SUPs to the roof of their car. The carry bag is big enough to repack the items with no issues and seems well made - time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations
customer_reviews.text: We love our SUP so much, we bought another one immediately, and two of our friends bought one as well. I use the SUP daily when I am at. my beach house. It's great for SUP, kayaking (also purchased the kayak paddle), yoga, pilates (also purchased the anchor). It's easy to inflate, stays inflated and does everything you need it to. I love that it's portable so I can pack it up and take it anywhere. Love my SUP's!!! Also, I have to note that customer service is exceptional! I lost the center fin, and they immediately responded and shipped a replacement. If you are thinking about this board, just buy it! you will not regret this puchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lioness

customer_reviews.title: Great iSUP for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I took a considerable amount of time to research my first iSUP. I’m 6’2” and weigh 200lbs. I wanted to make sure it wouldn’t “taco” on me when i used it. It didn’t disappoint! I really enjoy using this iSUP. It’s the first I’ve owned, so it’s difficult to talk about stability and the like since I have nothing to compare it to. I will say that it is procedurally easy to inflate. However, it will get your heart rate up while inflating it! It will take some effort. The only other thing I’ll say is it’s rather difficult to get it rolled up and back all in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lead for the Defense

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, good buy, good product
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd SUP. I have 2 Isles that I love and use at a Family beach house so they stay there. When I went to buy a 3rd board to use at the Lakes, I first got a ROC. It had either a defective channel or a defective fin which both annoyed me for a pricey SUP which I returned. Then I got the SereneLife for $200 less in pink, of course. Love everything about it. Good pump, good valves, great heavy duty carry bag. Light to carry for a 67 yr young gal. Highly recommend this board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Excellent Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great SUP, especially considering the price. We have owned several, starting with the giant/bulky/heavy plastic Lifetime beginner boards. This inflatable is plenty sturdy, moves quickly enough, and is easy to navigate. It's certainly not an $1800 light SUP, but I'd take this any day if you need to worry about storage. One piece of advise.....buy an automatic electric pump. You'll thank me, I promise. It's no fun pumping up and down 500 times in 98 degree weather while the kids wait patiently for a paddleboard. Buy the electric pump, drink a beer, and love your life!
customer_reviews.author: William N. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy But Fades Fast
customer_reviews.text: I bought this SUP in July and by August it was already faded. My spouse and I each have SUPs, his is a year old and has sharp colors, my brand new pink one is already so faded, it looks to be several years old. I'll continue to use it until I wear it out. But if I'd known in July (two months ago) what I know now, I would have gone for all features I wanted in a complete package and not worried about getting the cute pink one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this SUP but the color faded within 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I have had my board for almost 2 years and I love it except for the pretty pink color fading on top. My friend bought the same one last year in blue and her board is still the bright blue. I'm very disappointed that mine has faded so badly. I have never left it outside except for when I'm using it. After I use it I always deflate it and put it in it's carrying bag. I would give the product a full 5 stars if that didn't happen.
customer_reviews.author: samiam

customer_reviews.title: Happy to be on the water!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these boards! They are easy to inflate and can support myself with my child and dog. Great intro boards. I had a couple issues and the customer service exceeded my expectations. Definitely recommend this brand and board.
customer_reviews.author: GARY J KIROUAC

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The board is not at all stable in the water and it just isn’t built well. The edge of the board is uneven. Overall I wish I would have picked an other board.
customer_reviews.author: Ken z.

customer_reviews.title: DId not hold air
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this SUP out of the box except it didn't hold air very well. Everything else is great, but we tried three times to inflate it and each time we got it on the water it buckled a bit in the middle, which made it hard to use. We used both the pump that came with it as well as an electronic pump. Thankfully the return process was easy and we received a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Foxy

customer_reviews.title: For the price, its great
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this paddle board. Didn't want to spend a lot on a paddle board so I did a whole lot of research before I made this purchase but was overall pleased with it. It holds the air just fine. Would recommend purchasing an electronic pump but either that, everything it comes with it nice. Love how the paddles float so u can't lose them. Easy to stand up on after you get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Hilarie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastastic Stand up Paddleboard
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a paddleboard but had no real place to store it. This summer I had a chance to try an inflatable board and loved it the Thunder Wave Sup feels like a hard board and is very stable and firm. When I am done with it, I deflate it, put it in its duffle bag and store it on a shelf. It is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome SUP
customer_reviews.text: This product deserves every bit of the 5 star rating I gave it. I've only been able to use it a few times with my family, but it has been lot's of fun and convenient to use. I'm bringing it with me on the Gulf Coast Naples beach and Boca Raton beach as well. I good idea is to have extra bolts for the fin. I almost lost mine this past weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've gone out on the water with this at least 5 times now this summer and so far it's great. If it's pretty choppy, maybe don't air it up as much so it can absorb the waves. It's a little more wobbly than other boards but that's because it sits so high off the water.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 years on and still working great
customer_reviews.text: We love this paddle board. Price was great and have had no issues in 2.5 years of use. We kept inflated for first 2 years and never had any issues with lost air. This past summer, we have deflated/inflated many times to take on our boat and continue to have no issues beyond a lost fin which was replaced free of charge. Couldn't be happier - love the product and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Harls

customer_reviews.title: Love this SUP
customer_reviews.text: We love this paddle board! It’s very easy for our family to use, and kids. It takes less than 10 mins from start to finish to set up. It is not as wide as a rental SUP, but we don’t have an issue with it. It glides through the water well and turns easily. We did have a slight issue with the pump, but customer service resolved the issue with no problems. We love it and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: DB in Denver

customer_reviews.title: Great Board used on Colorado lakes and Hawaiian ocean
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love it! Easy to set up and very stable. I’m 5’3” 120# I’ve used it in Lakes and the ocean in Hawaii. Great for travel. The bag did get a small tear from the oar, so that’s a negative but overall GREAT board. I put the board in it’s bagand then in a larger rolling bag for air travel or general easy to get around
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Very nice SUP
customer_reviews.text: We have yet to test Sup in the water but we did blow it up and it seems like a well made product. My only complaint and it may be something im doing is the pump psi indicator does not work so I have no clue on the amount of air I put in. I will sent a updated review once I test Sup in the water.
customer_reviews.author: daydreamer

customer_reviews.title: Complete kit, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Board comes packed in a nice back pack, is easy to assemble and inflation took less than 10 minutes (pump attachment was a bit finicky). It was our first paddle board experience and the board was stable (even in boat wake) and easy to maneuver. Our family has had a lot of fun using these boards.
customer_reviews.author: blahblah

customer_reviews.title: It's more stable than you thought
customer_reviews.text: This is actually pretty sturdy for a inflatable board I've heard others who got different ones say they were disappointed with theirs, this one is pretty hard when inflated plus the paddle is adjustable for different heights, and the carry bag makes it so much easier to store and transport I was actually very impressed with this paddle board
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fades fast
customer_reviews.text: Have used the board about 5 times now, already pretty faded from a fuscia like pink to a bubble gum pink. Not looking forward to seeing it in another few trips. I do not leave it in the sun for storage so it’s simply fading quickly form regular light usage. Very Disappointing. Looks like it’s time to start saving for a new one within the year.
customer_reviews.author: EZim

customer_reviews.title: Free Flowin
customer_reviews.text: My wife and i received two of these free flow crafts as a wedding gifts and we absolutely love them. Very compact and portable. We are always able to roll these tightly and store them in the original bags which fit nicely in back of the SUV. Tips: - Always fill your craft up to 15 PSI - Always keep track of your detachable fin - It is worth investing in an electric air pump. There are many out there but of course serenelife sells many that are guaranteed to fit and work like a charm! - Just have fun and go with the flow!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever
customer_reviews.text: This paddleboard has been amazing. We bought 2 of them and have used them the past two summers and they are absolutely great. Once you inflate it, it remains at a good PSI for the whole summer. They are lightweight enough to easily strap to the roof of the car. It is durable and you feel completely stable on them. Would DEFINITELY recommend this paddleboard to anyone. I accidently lost the fin to attach to the bottom of the board and Pyle sent me a replacement one for FREE. They were awesome to deal with and super helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good board for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these boards. I have used them this summer. The price is excellent. The quality is strong for the price point. The customer service has been excellent. I lost a piece and they stayed with me, sending me parts two different times, free of charge, to help me get things squared away. Very impressive, and that is important for something like a paddle board. it isn't quite as stable as the boards that cost two and three times as much. That's what you get at this price point. But for the casual rider who will only use the thing several times a year, it's a perfect board.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Saldino

customer_reviews.title: Nice board-very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: So excited! Board arrived today with everything that was in the description. Can’t wait to try it out! Used the manual pump to see how it worked. My 11yr old daughter and I took turns inflating the board. It wasn’t as difficult as I had read in the reviews and took @ 10 minutes to set up the board from out of the box, start to finish. Inflating/deflating was quick and it packaged nicely into the carry bag (minus the pump) This is the kids and I first SUP and we are so grateful to have this board and enjoy the summer on the water together.
customer_reviews.author: LisaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Will not inflate all the way
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to this paddleboard especially with all the great reviews. It is a great, thick material. But it will not inflate all the way. And when I take the pump off, it immediately deflates. I followed the directions correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my wife. Had to get one for myself. We really like them. Keep them stored in the RV. I use an electronic pump. It takes a while. Sometimes when I take the pump loose, the valve doesn’t seal right away which let’s most of the pressure escape meaning I have to start over.
customer_reviews.author: Dwain S

customer_reviews.title: Air leaks out of port rapidly and handle pin slides.
customer_reviews.text: We had some problems with our original purchase including valve air leak and a malfunctioning paddle. We contacted the manufacturer after a couple of months for solution to our problems with their product. We were looking for a fix so we could attempt to solve the issue ourselves. They were very kind and sent us a whole new setup after a few emails back and fourth attempting to troubleshoot the problems. I highly recommend buying products from this company just based off of their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 boards and all of them exceeded our expectations. My main reason for the purchase was a board for my wife which she found easy to use, inflate and store. My wife and daughters used them on the lake for 5 days with family and friends. I used one of the boards and as long as in was inflated to proper specs it was easy to use even though I have never done it before. I would highly recommend these boards to anybody looking for a great beginner to advanced board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SereneLife Rocks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this paddle board for my daughter and she loves it 😃 it takes about 5 mins to pump up its very sturdy and great to paddle with and very easy to deflate and put back in the bag. My daughter lost the gilder fin a few weeks back and I wrote to Serene Life the customer service was fantastic they were very prompt on their reply to me and replaced the Fin without even charging me. I would highly recommend this paddle board and I highly recommend buying from sereneLife
customer_reviews.author: M.B C.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Updating my review: this is a great bang for your buck product. I just used it for 3 days on Lake Tahoe. When inflated enough it’s pretty stable. It’s tough to inflate past 10 psi but you need at least 14 to not fall over. The board was pretty steady going through the wakes of boats and jet skis. However, once all done I could not get it back in the bag. So four stars because it’s hard to inflate and tough to put everything away. Other than that I loved it. It’s worth what you pay. I’ll be looking into an electric pump.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality of accessories
customer_reviews.text: I really love the board itself, but the accessories are horrible. The pump attachment does not lock into the paddle board, so someone needs to hold it the entire time you’re pumping the board, and they have to hold it very tightly or air will slip out. My friends with other branded inflatable SUPs do not have this issue with their pumps. Additionally, the paddle is of poor quality and I am already unable to lock the paddle into its extended position due to the poor quality lock coming loose. I am going to have to buy a new pump and paddle to use this board.
customer_reviews.author: Asia Caluori

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my first one so much I had to get a second one so I could bring my fiancé or a friend along with me. The board is easy to carry and is very sturdy. I use my paddle boards 2-3 times a week. I absolutely love them! Also, the company is awesome. I lost a fin when I packed up one day at the lake and the company sent me one super fast and for free! Honestly, if I could give 10 stars I would!! This has been one of the best purchases I have ever made! The customer service has been fantastic. Call me crazy but I might just need to get a third one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Arndt

customer_reviews.title: This board is very rigid for an inflatable
customer_reviews.text: Only used once so far but the SUP is very sturdy and works as well as the solid board we have been using. We ended up buying a 12V air pump since it took too much time and effort using the hand pump.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Serene Life Customer Service Rocks
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid SUP person. After extensive research, I chose the Serene Life Inflatable and am very happy with my choice. It is easy to maneuver on the water. I live in Florida and take it to different waterways. This board is very easy to blow up, deflate, and store. After about a year of use, there was noticeable fading. I contacted the company and they replaced my board. I highly recommend this board to anyone looking for an inflatable. The customer service is great and easy to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Hohimer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This seems very comparable to my friends board that cost a little more. As a beginner have not problems with the use of it. I would recommend rinsing the black mat you stand on first before getting started or it will leave black on you. After rinsed it was not a problem. As all inflatables that last 5 lb of pressure is tougher, switch the pump to only be a one-way instead of double and actually made it easier when the pressure was above 10 PSI.
customer_reviews.author: Suprena

customer_reviews.title: Great board!
customer_reviews.text: I love my inflatable paddle board! It’s easy to transport, inflate, and deflate. I just wish the handle was closer toward the back of the board since it’s bottom heavy. The placement makes it a little difficult to carry. Other than that the board is sturdy and so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Summers

customer_reviews.title: Portable family fun
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once, but it set up quickly, was intuitive to use, and fun for the whole family. Used it on a Stillwater bay. It was very stable, but didn’t have much pick up or speed. My kids loved climbing on it and jumping off into the water to swim. Can’t wait to try it in the waves.
customer_reviews.author: MerLo

customer_reviews.title: Great board!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my daughter, and it has been fantastic. It is stable and easy to manage. I highly recommend getting an electric pump! The first time inflating it can be daunting, but just watch the pressure gauge. She has taken it out on a number of paddles and loves it. The backpack bag easily fits the board and gear. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Borsecnik

customer_reviews.title: Edited: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Edit 1: The customer service team was prompt enough to respond and followup. Shared the video of the leak and was sent a new paddle board. Looking forward to use it. AVOID: The board was excellent to use for the first month. Used it very weekend. But it started leaking near the valve and could not repair because of location of the leak. Unfortunately missed the return window by 5 days. It has been a week since I have contacted the support but to no avail. Not worth it to use only for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Arvind Chhikara

customer_reviews.title: Received a Used SUPB.
customer_reviews.text: Received a used item. Scratches on the fin from use. Parts out of baggies and already attached. Oily substance on parts. Dirt mark on the SUPB. Missing glue from repair kit.
customer_reviews.author: Tsuriman

customer_reviews.title: Great board, but adjustable paddle is crap.
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed the times I've taken this board out. It was a good purchase for a lower cost ISUP option with the exception of the paddle. It is adjustable, but it doesn't hold the position you "lock" it in. Is there a way to receive a different paddle? The lock is loose and I'm not sure if it's just a dud or if they are all like that. The customer service link doesn't link to the SereneLife store. If you're taller than 5ft. the paddle may be a concern.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not symmetrical.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this board, but it inflamed crooked, no symmetrical. I saw this exact board on the lake and it was perfectly centered, mine is a bit off making some of the seems that should be flat, be curved. Getting a replacement, will see if it any better.
customer_reviews.author: Odessit

customer_reviews.title: Deflated before first use
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I was excited to use this Stand Up Paddle Board. Inflated it immediately and it was deflated within 24 hours. It's never been used. Not one time. It's disappointing to pay almost $400 for an item and not be able to enjoy it. Customer Service through PyleUSA has been challenging. There is no refund or solution offered. There is no direct telephone number. Help is through a chat function that is not responsive. I would not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Deleo

customer_reviews.title: Best summer purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I had to order a replacement for this since the air would leak after 10 PSI. I really enjoy the one that’s good though. Me and my boyfriend both sit on it and paddle around in the water and it hold us perfectly fine. The paddle works great and tightens and stays. It’s very durable and stable. I have gone on it about 10 times so far and haven’t fallen off once! I highly recommend this product if you’re looking for an inflatable paddle board.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Haas

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this paddle board! We bought two- convenient to travel with, easy to inflate and packable! I timed it- exactly 5 minutes to inflate, about the same to wrap it up and pack it in the bag. We keep the pump Separate- I can’t fit it in the pack, but it’s no Problem. Very stable, I even took my dog out on it! Used in ocean, bay, lake and river! We have used it 13 times, no problems!
customer_reviews.author: S. G. Connolly

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase! Not only is it easy to assemble via pump, but it's also very easy to deflate and store. I have a convertible so I was hoping that it wouldn't be a hassle to inflate and deflate regularly and it is NOT! After reading other reviews, I was going to buy an electric pump but after seeing how easy it was for me to inflate, I decided against it. It literally takes me about 5 minutes from start to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: To narrow for my current size but still a keeper
customer_reviews.text: Quality build and awesome deal. But for my size I am having difficulty keeping it balanced. I’m 5’9 at 228lbs. Pumped it to 12psi, another 4 inches wider and it would make a world of difference for me.
customer_reviews.author: jsc

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Took it out today for the first time today and I’m obsessed! It’s sturdy, perfect size, easy to inflate (used electric pump), lightweight, and the pink color is fabulous. Only wish I had bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to maneuver. Our 14 year old grandson jumped right on and paddled away. We have only had it for 1 and 1/2 weeks but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: mainesail55

customer_reviews.title: Quality, easy to use, easy to transport
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a SUP that was a quality product but that I would not need help setting up or transporting. I got this board & it was everything I was hoping for. It’s stability is great for beginners & kids, but not so stable it is boring. It came with a paddle, pump, repair kit & leash. Everything fits in the backpack that I can carry myself—I’m a small female. I would recommend buying an air pump for quicker set up time.
customer_reviews.author: Allisha

customer_reviews.title: Great family SUP.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome paddle board for the money. Back pack is really comfortable meaning you can carry the board a good distance to get to more remote spots. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: A Farser

customer_reviews.title: Love my PINK ISUP
customer_reviews.text: I love my FreeFLow PINK ISUP! I cant wait to find new places to adventure to. Its easy to inflate and easy to loan on my car (I keep it inflated for good days) soon to get a pump for the car to make it easier.. Im in love with my SUP!!
customer_reviews.author: stacy desjardins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome inflatable SUP!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Love how easy it is to transport from the various lakes in our area. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle K

customer_reviews.title: Great portable SUP - everything fits in the backpack, even the paddle.  Heavy material, feels like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, equally as well for a 95lb person and a couple with total weight of 250. We will keep this in our RV. Love this! Easy to control and comfortable to paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia mom of two

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this paddle board. It is easy to inflate and use. The pump can get a little hard at the end, but it is worth it. I wish I would have bought this years ago. It also comes in a nice bag make it easier to store and transport.
customer_reviews.author: mrsromero

customer_reviews.title: It’s the perfect size to take anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I love how quickly it came and how compact it is. It comes in a case that you can carry on your back. I take it on my boat and it doesn’t even take up that much room. What a great invention!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Grayburn

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use on a lake for teens and adults. Very stable and easy to use, stayed inflated over the course of several days. We are beginners so don't have much to compare it to, but the mom (aka me) was able to stand up on it at age 51. It takes about 10 minutes or so pump up with the pump, but it was not difficult. Love the carrying case with back straps. Overall a great purchase, my kids loved it and so did I.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gabbert

customer_reviews.title: An impressive product!
customer_reviews.text: The SUP is very rigid, well-made and has an overall feeling of being long-lasting board. It was easy to inflate with the good quality pump and very intuitive to figure out the valve system. Great product so far!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew & Blake's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Stable, easy inflatable, easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Great paddle board not quiet as stable as a solid board (I don't think) but plenty stable to stand up on and paddle in the ocean. Easy to inflate and carry. Great for trips. Paddled several miles in the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: branedge

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I went out on a limb being that my daughter and I had never paddle boarded before.... I read the reviews for different SUP's and chose to go with this one. We have loved it! it's easy to inflate and deflate. Once deflated it is easy to pack up in the bag provided. We did need to request a new fin. I reached out to customer service and was sent a replacement with in a week at no charge!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Havn't used it yet, water to cold
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for Christmas. Received in a timely manner. Inflated one of the boards in the living room and it is surprisingly strong and stable to stand on. Agree it's tough for the last lbs of air into the board without an elec pump. Don't know about the maneuverability (not in water yet) but had to select stars for the review. Am looking forward to using the board in the spring at the Delaware beaches.
customer_reviews.author: kim m.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was my first purchase into the world of paddle boarding. The board is great for a beginner. Very stable, and inflates to feel like a solid board. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B. LIERL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Received product in a timely manner. Set up was easy enough. Took it to a lake first time out, and it's definitely a bit more difficult to maneuver in choppy waters. I was a bit disappointed that I wasn't able to get up as easily as I have on hard boards and more expensive inflatable SUPs. Hopefully I can adjust but definitely not as stable as the higher end boards which isn't a surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Annalynn Ballachino

customer_reviews.title: Problem with my board.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with a small hole that I had to patch, followed the directions and the patch still leaks a little bit, center fin fell off on the first ride the company sent me a replacement which was nice but when I put that one in the nut inside the board is messed up. On the second ride the button holding the paddle together broke. Over all the board is really nice but I think i received a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: I’m a dog

customer_reviews.title: Easily packaged and lived around
customer_reviews.text: Harder to stand up in than others. Easy to transport was the reason of purchase. In the end it was a good buy. The electric pump is almost a must with this. WAY WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Hollowell

customer_reviews.title: Great inflatable SUP
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect shape, quick shipping, haven’t used it yet but I already purchased the automatic air pump as it was pretty strenuous to pump up. Will also be purchasing the seat that goes with it. Can’t wait to take it out on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great ISUP
customer_reviews.text: I love this SUP! It’s easy to inflate (I use an electric pump). It is stable, and looks amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: JoeyC09

customer_reviews.title: Great Inflatable SUP!
customer_reviews.text: I was thoroughly surprised by the sturdiness of this SUP. Having only used SUPs that did not need to be inflated, I was worried about feeling confident in choppy waters, but this board stood up to the test! It is a great size and easy to store. I also love the pink color. Would highly recommend purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Easy and stable
customer_reviews.text: This standup paddleboard has worked really well for us and we are complete beginners. It takes less than five minutes to inflate. The only downside is when it's in the bag it's fairly heavy for me to carry. I can get it from the car to the water with no problem but couldn't hike to water with it. On the water it's very stable.
customer_reviews.author: amanda chater

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Deck is already peeling off after two weeks. Wish I would have just opted for a different brand and one that I’ve already used before
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned about the quality of this because the price was so cheap. Works well and is a lot of fun. Great deal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Water ready!
customer_reviews.text: Very stable and feels like a solid board when inflated. Easy to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Nice board... Comes with everything you need. Easy to use and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Kumo

customer_reviews.title: A Great Quarantine Passtime
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I both got paddle board as a way to stay active during quarantine. I got this board and him, a Body Glove Performer 11. Comparatively, this board is lighter, more agile, and easier to maneuver and transport. Definitely a great buy. I'm extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Reich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect complete package for paddle board beginner
customer_reviews.text: The assembly quick and inflation was surprisingly fast and easy with the double-action pump included. Board performed great and was super easy to balance on. My Yeti strapped on easily to the front. They are light enough and the handle works for my wife and kids to carry. I bought SereneLife boards for the whole family! We've had a blast with them so far!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Add-on electric pump for more fun!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely purchase an adapter for electric air pump. Manual power is very tiring, can be done, but by the time you’ve pumped it up, you’re too tired to go.
customer_reviews.author: Jan M. Neil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We can fit 4 people and still not sink. Makes lake time so much more fun! Worth every penny spent!
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Compares to $800 Paddleboards!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews and looked at several comparison videos of other inflatable boards. This board (the b08 version) has all the specs of the $850 board except for the inferior fin box. I took my board out yesterday and it worked flawlessly! I also purchased the Serenelife seat and a cheap Kayak paddle, and my SUP now also substitutes as a ride on top kayak :)
customer_reviews.author: Sherilyn Harper

customer_reviews.title: We love them so much, we bought a 2nd!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second SereneLife paddle board, and we love them! They are sturdy and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: GinaJim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect paddle board
customer_reviews.text: Great board for beginners. I had no trouble using this model and it's great for traveling with. Also, had the best customer service ever. I asked for information about a part and got much more useful information along with the answer I asked for
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Board!!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchase my paddle-board late July. Received it early August and have taken it out twice so for. I was able to get up on the board the first time and also had my grandson stand on it with me. The board was very stable and very easy to maneuver. I feel I got a great board for the money. I would definitely recommend this board to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Meier

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Me, my wife, and my kids all had a blast on it. It does take some effort to inflate so be aware of that. I use a shop vac to get it started and that saves a ton of time. It tracks straight, and doesn’t have much flex when you’re on it. I am 240 pounds for reference
customer_reviews.author: Tim S.

customer_reviews.title: Great paddleboard for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I got this paddle board to go out on a trip to a large lake, and it held up to some substantial waves in regard to stability. It was comparable to the more expensive brand-name board my friends had. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bubba G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent board, excellent customer service when the board arrived late...
customer_reviews.text: This is as good a board as the next, inflates and deflates easily and is 'as-advertised.' Very happy with this purchase. I'm 5-10 165 lbs and it's perfect for me, max is about 280lbs I'd say. I had some delays with my order but the company was fast to respond and rectify. No hesitations recommending them and I hope you enjoy your new board!
customer_reviews.author: Brad B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first SUP, so I don't have a whole lot to compare it to, but my wife and I love these SUPs. The work as advertised and we have people ask about the just about any time we go out. It seems like the pink is fading a bit, something I haven't noticed with the orange, but its still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: James Riha

product_meta.title: SereneLife Premium Inflatable Stand Up Paddle Board (6 Inches Thick) with SUP Accessories & Carry Bag | Wide Stance, Bottom Fin for Paddling, Surf Control, Non-Slip Deck | Youth & Adult Standing Boat
feature_bullets: EXTRA WIDE FOR BETTER BALANCE: Measuring 10’5 feet long & 30 inches wide, balancing & stabilizing on top of our SUP board is a breeze

SOFT, STABLE & ANTI-SLIP TOP DECK: Perfect for beginners, we've upgraded this inflatable paddle board with a no-slip soft top that cushions your fall when slips or accidents occur They happen to the best of us, so might as well be prepared

BEST PADDLING MANEUVERABILITY: Outfitted with triple bottom panel fins, steering & handling the stand up inflatable paddle boards is incredibly easy Offering exceptional surf control, you'll be gliding & skimming the water like a sea creature

PORTABLE & INFLATABLE SUP BOARD: 100% travel-friendly, this unique SUP inflatable paddle board is preferred by those who have a knack for adventure Take it with you on surfing excursions or keep it in your car for those times you want to explore

ALL-IN-1 BLOW UP PADDLE BOARD KIT: Complete with must-have paddle board accessories, our SUP paddle board will have you ready to hit the waves Includes 10' board, coiled ankle cuff safety leash, Upgraded Aluminum paddle, manual air pump & storage bag

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
